00038 void QHsm::dispatch(QEvent const *e) {
00039     QStateHandler path[QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_];
00040     QStateHandler s;
00041     QStateHandler t;
00042     QState r;
00043     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00044 
00045     t = m_state;                                     // save the current state
00046 
00047     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_DISPATCH, QS::smObj_, this)
00048         QS_TIME_();                                              // time stamp
00049         QS_SIG_(e->sig);                            // the signal of the event
00050         QS_OBJ_(this);                            // this state machine object
00051         QS_FUN_(t);                                       // the current state
00052     QS_END_()
00053 
00054     do {                                // process the event hierarchically...
00055         s = m_state;
00056         r = (*s)(this, e);                           // invoke state handler s
00057     } while (r == Q_RET_SUPER);
00058 
00059     if (r == Q_RET_TRAN) {                                // transition taken?
00060 #ifdef Q_SPY
00061         QStateHandler src = s;       // save the transition source for tracing
00062 #endif
00063         int8_t ip = (int8_t)(-1);               // transition entry path index
00064         int8_t iq;                       // helper transition entry path index
00065 
00066         path[0] = m_state;                // save the target of the transition
00067         path[1] = t;
00068 
00069         while (t != s) {       // exit current state to transition source s...
00070             if (QEP_TRIG_(t, Q_EXIT_SIG) == Q_RET_HANDLED) {   //exit handled?
00071                 QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT, QS::smObj_, this)
00072                     QS_OBJ_(this);                // this state machine object
00073                     QS_FUN_(t);                            // the exited state
00074                 QS_END_()
00075 
00076                 (void)QEP_TRIG_(t, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);    // find superstate of t
00077             }
00078             t = m_state;                       // m_state holds the superstate
00079         }
00080 
00081         t = path[0];                               // target of the transition
00082 
00083         if (s == t) {         // (a) check source==target (transition to self)
00084             QEP_EXIT_(s)                                    // exit the source
00085             ip = (int8_t)0;                                // enter the target
00086         }
00087         else {
00088             (void)QEP_TRIG_(t, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);        // superstate of target
00089             t = m_state;
00090             if (s == t) {                   // (b) check source==target->super
00091                 ip = (int8_t)0;                            // enter the target
00092             }
00093             else {
00094                 (void)QEP_TRIG_(s, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);       // superstate of src
00095                                      // (c) check source->super==target->super
00096                 if (m_state == t) {
00097                     QEP_EXIT_(s)                            // exit the source
00098                     ip = (int8_t)0;                        // enter the target
00099                 }
00100                 else {
00101                                             // (d) check source->super==target
00102                     if (m_state == path[0]) {
00103                         QEP_EXIT_(s)                        // exit the source
00104                     }
00105                     else { // (e) check rest of source==target->super->super..
00106                            // and store the entry path along the way
00107                            //
00108                         iq = (int8_t)0;         // indicate that LCA not found
00109                         ip = (int8_t)1;     // enter target and its superstate
00110                         path[1] = t;          // save the superstate of target
00111                         t = m_state;                     // save source->super
00112                                                   // find target->super->super
00113                         r = QEP_TRIG_(path[1], QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00114                         while (r == Q_RET_SUPER) {
00115                             ++ip;
00116                             path[ip] = m_state;        // store the entry path
00117                             if (m_state == s) {           // is it the source?
00118                                 iq = (int8_t)1;     // indicate that LCA found
00119                                                // entry path must not overflow
00120                                 Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00121                                 --ip;               // do not enter the source
00122                                 r = Q_RET_HANDLED;       // terminate the loop
00123                             }
00124                             else {      // it is not the source, keep going up
00125                                 r = QEP_TRIG_(m_state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00126                             }
00127                         }
00128                         if (iq == (int8_t)0) {       // the LCA not found yet?
00129 
00130                                                // entry path must not overflow
00131                             Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00132 
00133                             QEP_EXIT_(s)                   // exit the source
00134 
00135                             // (f) check the rest of source->super
00136                             //                  == target->super->super...
00137                             //
00138                             iq = ip;
00139                             r = Q_RET_IGNORED;       // indicate LCA NOT found
00140                             do {
00141                                 if (t == path[iq]) {       // is this the LCA?
00142                                     r = Q_RET_HANDLED;   // indicate LCA found
00143                                     ip = (int8_t)(iq - 1); // do not enter LCA
00144                                     iq = (int8_t)(-1);   // terminate the loop
00145                                 }
00146                                 else {
00147                                     --iq;    // try lower superstate of target
00148                                 }
00149                             } while (iq >= (int8_t)0);
00150 
00151                             if (r != Q_RET_HANDLED) {    // LCA not found yet?
00152                                 // (g) check each source->super->...
00153                                 // for each target->super...
00154                                 //
00155                                 r = Q_RET_IGNORED;             // keep looping
00156                                 do {
00157                                                           // exit t unhandled?
00158                                     if (QEP_TRIG_(t, Q_EXIT_SIG)
00159                                         == Q_RET_HANDLED)
00160                                     {
00161                                         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT,
00162                                                   QS::smObj_, this)
00163                                             QS_OBJ_(this);
00164                                             QS_FUN_(t);
00165                                         QS_END_()
00166 
00167                                         (void)QEP_TRIG_(t, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00168                                     }
00169                                     t = m_state;         //  set to super of t
00170                                     iq = ip;
00171                                     do {
00172                                         if (t == path[iq]) {   // is this LCA?
00173                                                            // do not enter LCA
00174                                             ip = (int8_t)(iq - 1);
00175                                             iq = (int8_t)(-1);   //break inner
00176                                             r = Q_RET_HANDLED;   //break outer
00177                                         }
00178                                         else {
00179                                             --iq;
00180                                         }
00181                                     } while (iq >= (int8_t)0);
00182                                 } while (r != Q_RET_HANDLED);
00183                             }
00184                         }
00185                     }
00186                 }
00187             }
00188         }
00189                        // retrace the entry path in reverse (desired) order...
00190         for (; ip >= (int8_t)0; --ip) {
00191             QEP_ENTER_(path[ip])                             // enter path[ip]
00192         }
00193         t = path[0];                         // stick the target into register
00194         m_state = t;                               // update the current state
00195 
00196                                          // drill into the target hierarchy...
00197         while (QEP_TRIG_(t, Q_INIT_SIG) == Q_RET_TRAN) {
00198 
00199             QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_INIT, QS::smObj_, this)
00200                 QS_OBJ_(this);                    // this state machine object
00201                 QS_FUN_(t);                        // the source (pseudo)state
00202                 QS_FUN_(m_state);              // the target of the transition
00203             QS_END_()
00204 
00205             ip = (int8_t)0;
00206             path[0] = m_state;
00207             (void)QEP_TRIG_(m_state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);       // find superstate
00208             while (m_state != t) {
00209                 ++ip;
00210                 path[ip] = m_state;
00211                 (void)QEP_TRIG_(m_state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);   // find superstate
00212             }
00213             m_state = path[0];
00214                                                // entry path must not overflow
00215             Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00216 
00217             do {       // retrace the entry path in reverse (correct) order...
00218                 QEP_ENTER_(path[ip])                         // enter path[ip]
00219                 --ip;
00220             } while (ip >= (int8_t)0);
00221 
00222             t = path[0];
00223         }
00224 
00225         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_TRAN, QS::smObj_, this)
00226             QS_TIME_();                                          // time stamp
00227             QS_SIG_(e->sig);                        // the signal of the event
00228             QS_OBJ_(this);                        // this state machine object
00229             QS_FUN_(src);                      // the source of the transition
00230             QS_FUN_(t);                                // the new active state
00231         QS_END_()
00232 
00233     }
00234     else {                                             // transition not taken
00235 #ifdef Q_SPY
00236         if (r == Q_RET_IGNORED) {                            // event ignored?
00237 
00238             QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_IGNORED, QS::smObj_, this)
00239                 QS_TIME_();                                      // time stamp
00240                 QS_SIG_(e->sig);                    // the signal of the event
00241                 QS_OBJ_(this);                    // this state machine object
00242                 QS_FUN_(t);                               // the current state
00243             QS_END_()
00244 
00245         }
00246         else {                                                // event handled
00247 
00248             QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_INTERN_TRAN, QS::smObj_, this)
00249                 QS_TIME_();                                      // time stamp
00250                 QS_SIG_(e->sig);                    // the signal of the event
00251                 QS_OBJ_(this);                    // this state machine object
00252                 QS_FUN_(s);                // the state that handled the event
00253             QS_END_()
00254 
00255         }
00256 #endif
00257     }
00258     m_state = t;                 // set new state or restore the current state
00259 }
